articles.description: ​​With the state governments' fiscal deficit projected at a relatively modest 3.3 per cent of GDP in FY2022, the general government fiscal deficit is estimated at around 10.4 per cent of the GDP, the agency said in a report.

articles.title: Oil at USD 84 again: Petrol, diesel price on hold for 68th day in a row - Economic Times
articles.description: On November 4, 2021, excise duty on diesel was cut by Rs 10 a litre and that on petrol by Rs 5 per litre, resulting in an equivalent reduction in retail pump rates.
articles.content: Petrol and diesel prices have remained unchanged for 68 days in a row despite a USD 16 swing in international oil prices and global rates again climbing to USD 84 per barrel, oil company data showed.… [+5041 chars]
